allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: URL-based call detail and shareable filter links" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add URL-based navigation for call details using `correlationId` parameter
- Add shareable URLs with compressed filter state for the calls page
- Support deep linking to specific calls with filters preserved

## Changes
- **URL Parameters**: `f` \(firm_id\), `e` \(environment\), `c` \(correlationId\), `s` \(compressed state\)
- **API Enhancement**: Call detail endpoint now accepts both numeric ID and correlation ID \(UUID\)
- **Share Buttons**: 
  - "Share" button in page header for sharing filtered view
  - Share icon in Quick Links section for sharing specific call
- **Compression**: Uses lz-string to compress filter state for shorter URLs
- **Deep Linking**: Opening a shared URL restores all filters and selected call

## URL Format
```
/calls?f=5&e=production&s=N4IgDg...&c=019c10c9-a3dc-7bb7-8374-bb6d800ed7a1
```

## Test plan
- [ ] Click a call row â†’ URL updates with correlationId
- [ ] Close detail panel â†’ correlationId removed from URL
- [ ] Click "Share" in header â†’ copies URL with all filters
- [ ] Click share icon in Quick Links â†’ copies URL with call + filters
- [ ] Open shared URL â†’ filters and call restored correctly
- [ ] Reset Filters â†’ URL cleared

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
